version_description:
The LeaveHomeSafe mobile app provides citizens a convenient digital tool to record their visit history themselves on their mobile phones by scanning QR codes displayed in venues.

What’s new in our latest update:
- new OCR function for taxi registration mark

The LeaveHomeSafe mobile app provides citizens a convenient digital tool to record their visit history themselves on their mobile phones by scanning QR codes displayed in venues.

What’s new in our latest update:
- new OCR function for taxi registration mark

The LeaveHomeSafe mobile app provides citizens a convenient digital tool to record their visit history themselves on their mobile phones by scanning QR codes displayed in venues.

What’s new in our latest update:

What’s new in the latest update: 
-	users can view their own visit records;
-	auto check-out function; and
-	simplifying steps in entering into different venues.

What is new in the latest update

1. Streamlined login to Hong Kong Health Code System from LeaveHomeSafe
2. Added document types for accounts of Hong Kong Health Code System
3. Enhanced update workflow of electronic vaccination and testing records in LeaveHomeSafe
4. Bug fixes

What is new in the latest update

1. Streamlined login to Hong Kong Health Code System from LeaveHomeSafe
2. Added document types for accounts of Hong Kong Health Code System
3. Enhanced update workflow of electronic vaccination and testing records in LeaveHomeSafe
4. Bug fixes

What is new in the latest update

1. Streamlined login to Hong Kong Health Code System from LeaveHomeSafe
2. Added document types for accounts of Hong Kong Health Code System
3. Enhanced update workflow of electronic vaccination and testing records in LeaveHomeSafe
4. Bug fixes

What’s new in the latest update:
•	Support COVID-19 vaccination medical exemption certificate
•	Auto-display QR code of vaccination record / medical exemption certificate on the check-in page 
•	Enable/Disable authentication by biometrics or password check for accessing electronic vaccination and testing records (default off)
•	Enable/Disable connection to the Hong Kong Health Code System (default on)
•	Improve sound/vibration feedback of scanning venue QR code
•	Add app shortcuts to the main screen
•	Improve UI and fix bugs

•	Support COVID-19 vaccination medical exemption certificate

•	Enable/Disable authentication by biometrics or password check for accessing electronic vaccination and testing records (default off)
•	Enable/Disable connection to the Hong Kong Health Code System (default on)
•	Improve sound/vibration feedback of scanning venue QR code
•	Add app shortcuts to the main screen
•	Improve UI and fix bugs

What’s new in the latest update:
•    Display a red QR code for showing there is no vaccination record on the check-in page
•    Add "Back To Previous Venue" button on the check-in page
•    Add "Check update" link on the setting page
•    Improve UI and fix bugs
